pages.text: The Hovering Inferno (or just Inferno) is a blaze-like mob that patrols the Nether. It is an uncommon spawn, and when it shows up it brings several Blazes along with it. It is capable of shooting a line of fireballs at its enemies, and can put up its shields to block damage.
The first mob added to the mod, the Hovering Inferno is a dangerous mob that scouts the Nether.
Infernos found in Soul Sand Valleys.
Blazes also get variants with the Inferno.
